item.title: Daily Cloud Computing News from @cloudfeednet - Jan 23, 2017
item.description:
Daily Cloud Computing news from @cloudfeednet.

What you didn’t know about OpenStack Newton Performance and Scalability for

openPR (press release) Tallinn, Estonia, 23 January 2017 - Sardina Systems announces availability of support for the OpenStack Newton release, while promising significant … more.

Google Cloud ramps up enterprise credentials with Audit Logging

The Google Cloud Platform stack addition will see Audit Logging integrated with Google Compute Engine, Container Engine, Dataproc, Deployment … more.

Microsoft releases Power BI Content Pack for Azure Active Directory

Last week, Microsoft released the new Power BI Content Pack for Azure Active Directory. In addition to the usage and activity reports in the Azure … more.

10 new AWS cloud services you never expected

Now Amazon Web Services is zooming ahead with a collection of new products that blow apart the idea of the cloud as a blank slate. With the latest … more.

Getting Started with Azure SQL Data Warehouse - Part 1

Microsoft introduced Azure SQL Data Warehouse, a new enterprise-class, elastic petabyte-scale, data warehouse service that can scale according to … more.

Commvault Simplifies Data Management in the Cloud with Launch of Validated

Yahoo Finance … today launched new reference architectures for Amazon Web Services (AWS) to enable customers to simplify data protection and management with … more.

Oxfam turns to Rackspace & Microsoft Azure Cloud to battle global poverty

The charity, which is famous for aiming to reduce global poverty levels, has turned to Rackspace’s Fanatical Support for Microsoft Azure as it migrates … more.

Barracuda Introduces 2 New Virtual Firewalls

… VMware, Citrix XenServer, KVM and Hyper-V private clouds and workloads hosted offsite in Microsoft Azure, AWS and Google Cloud Platform. more.

Looker Launches Support for Amazon Athena

… warehouse with no infrastructure to manage and no data loading required, said Rahul Pathak, GM, Amazon Athena, Amazon Web Services. more.

GIGABYTE Selects Cavium QLogic 10/25GbE FastLinQ Technology To Power Its

Yahoo Finance OpenStack Integration: Cavium QLogic technologies, such as the Plug-in for Mirantis Fuel for automatic SR-IOV configuration across multiple … more.

Global learning through Amazon Web Services with revolutionary studio

Satellite PR News (press release) We will explore what Amazon Web Services (Amazon Polly, Amazon Lex and Amazon Rekognition) offers, how it can help distribute learning and how … more.

Modus Announces Industry-Leading Amazon Cloud Technology Solution to

Military Technologies Modus, a leading provider of eDiscovery business intelligence services, today announced the successful deployment of the Amazon Web Services … more.

Barracuda Introduces Virtual And Public Cloud Firewalls For MSPs

… or provide secure and reliable connectivity for Microsoft Azure, Amazon Web Services (AWS), and Google Cloud Platform public cloud deployments. more.

Why the VMware-Amazon Deal Is Expected to Be a Game Changer

VMware’s expertise lies in private cloud services, while Amazon’s AWS (Amazon Web Services) is the clear leader in terms of public cloud services. more.

Microsoft kicks off BlueHat cyber security event in Tel Aviv this week

Security industry professionals from around the globe will be speaking at the event, including world-famous hacker The Grugq, Microsoft Azure chief … more.

Amazon Web Services: Build Resiliency into your AWS Environment

full capabilities of Sungard AS including Operating System recovery, … more.

Google Appoints New Channel Chief to Step Up Cloud Focus

Currently Greene leads Google’s cloud division, and oversees Google’s enterprise strategy and channel efforts. She kicked off Google’s cloud focus in … more.

Modus Announces Industry-Leading Amazon Cloud Technology Solution To

HostReview.com (press release) Our partnership with Amazon gives us the best technology backbone in the industry as Amazon’s Web Services capabilities are significantly ahead of … more.

9 tips to properly configure your OpenStack Instance

In OpenStack jargon, an Instance is a Virtual Machine, the guest workload. It boots from an operating system image, and it is configured with a certain … more.

Office 365 reigns supreme as most popular Aussie business app

… management service for businesses, Box, is the second most widely used app across the country, followed by Amazon Web Services and G Suite. more.

New Google worldwide channel chief to dial into the cloud

Yansouni joined Google this past November as the vice president of global partner sales and strategic alliances for Google Cloud after previously … more.

Amazon opening first fulfillment center in Colorado, hiring 1000 in Aurora

The first employees started at the Aurora sortation center in June and the company has been hiring workers for its Amazon web services for most of the … more.

Microsoft Brings Power BI Content Pack for Azure Active Directory

Microsoft has recently announced a new Power BI Content Pack for Azure Active Directory. The company revealed the new integration on its official … more.

Amazon Web Services (AWS) more popular than Google’s cloud product

In some areas of the high-tech world, Amazon.com comes out ahead of Google in the popularity stakes. This is true for services developed by Amazon … more.

TruGolf and Shout TV to form a strategic partnership to launch a Virtual

Yahoo Finance Hosted on Microsoft Azure, the Virtual Players Tour will offer Shout’s knowledge-based games and TruGolf’s best-in-class golf software, playable in … more.

Amazon Web Services (AWS) more popular than Google’s cloud product

This is true for services developed by Amazon Web Services (AWS), the Amazon cloud-computing division, which came fourth in terms of web … more.

New York Times editor Quentin Hardy is heading to Google

Hardy tweeted Monday that he had accepted an offer to head editorial for Google Cloud, which includes G Suite and Google Cloud Platform. Google … more.

Microsoft Offering Windows 10 Upgrades Through Subscriber Service

DAILY VIDEO: Microsoft to dole out free Windows 10 upgrades via … update; Intel’s cloud-friendly Clear Linux hits Microsoft Azure; and there’s more. more.
